EmailTemplate.name: LE-03-14-202203-HHS-ENT-SEVT-HIMSS22.Pre Event Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: We hope to see you at HIMSS22
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MEET US AT HIMSS22
March 14–18, 2022 Orlando, FL Orlando skyline at night If you’re attending HIMSS22, we invite you to schedule a meeting <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/himss-2022-strategy-session-with-teladoc-health?month=2022-01]]> or stop by booth 4449 <[[https://himss22.mapyourshow.com/8_0/floorplan/?hallID=W&selectedBooth=booth~4449]]> to hear more about our enterprise virtual care offering. Be sure to also attend our speaking session <[[https://www.himss.org/global-conference/session-lessons-learned-launching-virtual-nursing-unit]]> on Tuesday, March 15th at 4:15 p.m. to hear how Saint Luke’s Health System leveraged virtual care to serve their inpatient population and help alleviate their nurse staffing challenges. Schedule a meeting with Teladoc Health <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/himss-2022-strategy-session-with-teladoc-health?month=2022-01]]> Unsubscribe <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/subscriptions.html]]> | Privacy <[[https://teladochealth.com/privacy-policy/]]> | Legal Notice <[[https://teladochealth.com/notice-of-non-discrimination/]]> ©Teladoc Health, Inc. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Rd., Purchase, NY 10577
